thread.title: adidas x Rick Owens Continues Bold Aesthetic Trend With New Walrus Sneakers
thread.title_full: adidas x Rick Owens Continues Bold Aesthetic Trend With New Walrus Sneakers

author: Marcus Cho
title: adidas x Rick Owens Continues Bold Aesthetic Trend With New Walrus Sneakers
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
In terms of sneakers, Rick Owens is famed for bringing strange silhouettes to life – his Geobaskets being just one of many examples of his free-flowing work.
Now, in teaming up with adidas Rick Owens has produced a new sneaker dubbed the “Walrus.” Featuring an off-white sheep leather upper, the sneaker finds itself complemented by black laces and distinct white and black outsole. Finishing off the look is an exaggerated heel counter and midsole blocks, which both serve to give the shoe that strong Rick Owens vibe.
The adidas x Rick Owens Walrus sneakers are now available at retailers like Wrong Weather for a retail price of $725 USD.
